comments:
Doing the bottom up web service tutorial for flexible project structure using
the IBuild (I20050610) the wizard doesn't show me the client runtime choose
dialog when I click on edit... (the server one works: I chose Axis1.1,
Tomcat5.0. J2EE 1.4), pressing finish results in a NullPointerException:

Jens, have you tried this on Windows? If not, would you be able to please?
The wizard code has changed significantly in the last couple of years.  This problem cannot be reproduced with recent WTP drivers.
